metadata.title: CVE-2021-3416 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A potential stack overflow via infinite loop issue was found in various NICemulators of QEMU in versions up to and including 5.2.0. The issue occursin loopback mode of a NIC wherein reentrant DMA checks get bypassed. Aguest user/process may use this flaw to consume CPU cycles or crash theQEMU process on the host resulting in DoS scenario.

criterions.comment: qemu package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
